title: Old Judge Die cut for Sale
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: Old Judge Die cut for Sale
posts.post_content:
Plate copy from old Judge book. It is rare to see 19th century advertising that appealed to the black consumer. In the Old Judge die cut ad set, the company produced die cuts of women, blacks, military men, etc to show each group were potential consumers of Old Judge cigarettes. This is a scarce piece and is No Longer Available

Thanks--Jay
